channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SOLR-2159] CloudStateUpdateTest.testCoreRegistration test failure
item.description:
CloudStateUpdateTest.testCoreRegistration failed in Hudson, with:

expected:<2> but was:<3>

Here is the stacktrace:

    [junit] Testsuite: org.apache.solr.cloud.CloudStateUpdateTest
    [junit] Testcase: testCoreRegistration(org.apache.solr.cloud.CloudStateUpdateTest):	FAILED
    [junit] expected:<2> but was:<3>

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: I tried bumping up the number of retries on this - was only 4*50ms = 200ms. Brought that up to 500ms for now - will see if this pops up again.

I ran the test for 100 times and can not find a failed one. The implementation code changes a lot over 6 years, so I think we can close this issue here. If the error happen again we can open another ticket with an updated tests.seed.
